abstract: Republicans are standing their ground on automatic spending cuts, underscoring what some say was a major miscalculation by Pres Obama, who believed threat of reductions in military spending would force party's lawmakers to agree to deficit reduction plan that included tax increases; situation highlights how Republicans dedicated to shrinking government are now more dominant than bloc committed to robust national defense.
lead_paragraph: Republicans are now ready to stand their ground on spending cuts that will hit the military hard, underscoring what some say was a miscalculation on President Obama’s part.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

byline.original: By JONATHAN WEISMAN and ASHLEY PARKER

headline.main: Acceptance of Defense Cuts Signals Shift in G.O.P. Focus
headline.print_headline: Budget Impasse Signals a Shift in G.O.P.’s Focus
headline.seo: Democrats and Republicans Miscalculate on Automatic Cuts

snippet: Republicans are now ready to stand their ground on spending cuts that will hit the military hard, underscoring what some say was a miscalculation on President Obama’s part....
